entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Databinding errors on ListView - What am I doing wrong? #19873
  • ReturnType API for SearchBar like for Entry #19872
  • MenuFlyoutSeparator is not working on MacCatalyst #19870
  • Add cross-platform lifecycle events #19869
  • Picking a lot of files with FilePicker is extremely slow on Windows, and can raise access exceptions on iOS #19868
  • Label FormattedText fails to display html text when populated via binding #19867
  • [iOS] UICollectionView ScrollsToTop does not work #19866
  • Increase Test Coverage UI/manual tests for Essentials #19862
  • NavigationPage: BarBackgroundColor, BarTextColor and Title not updating #19859
  • iOS Debug cannot start but build and deploy works #19858
  • Enable Device Testing on Mac Catalyst using Mac Idiom #19856
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] For D3 pages, periods can be entered with more than 5 characters. #19853

Closed

  • [ci] Builds are failing with different xharness versions #19864
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] Hardware keyboard in FormSheet disturbs content sizing #19245
    Backlog
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling with Star-sized grid row #18354
    .NET 8 SR2
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - Entry Next Editor #17588
    Backlog
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling UITesting #17559
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Unable to request android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS #19658
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting CancelButtonColor on SearchBar has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18110
    Backlog
  • [net7.0 / net8.0] [iOS] Memory leak when the CollectionView uses CollectionChanged and when adding a CollectionView to a Page makes it and the entire page live forever #14654
  • Images in html from assets displaying in WebView are not displayed on Android and iOS #19189
    Backlog
  • Label with TextType="Html" will crash on Windows if html is invalid. #17457

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [ci] Don't install xharness globally #19863
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [net8.0] Use XCode 15.2 on net8 branch #19865
  • Add missing AbsoluteLayout section to layout architecture doc #19841
  • [ci] Bump XCode to 15.2.0 #19836
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, testing-infrastructure
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • Added optional ReceiveSms permission #19659
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Catalyst] Allow setting of CancelButtonColor on SearchBar when using Mac Idiom #19838
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Show the Raw HTML for Html Label in case of error #17470
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, stale
  • Add basic docs for ScrollView implementations #19766
    area/docs 📓, area/layout 🔲
  • Fix Android MediaPicker Photo capture logic #19844
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #19824
    community ✨
  • [Trimming] Fix several trimming warnings #19402
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Fix condition to bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll in app extensions on Apple platforms. Fixes #19756. #19757
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨, stale
  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with main #19847
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • fix - 12469 - android refreshview isrefreshing binding #18273
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    area/FlyoutPage, community ✨, stale
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale
  • [xamlg] improve error for Xamarin.Forms namespace #19683
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨, stale
